Package org.jcatapult.guice

Class Summary
ConfigurationModule This is a Guice module that is used by most of the framework to get at the JCatapult configuration files (i.e.
GuiceContainer This class is a singleton that allows Guice to be configured by JCatapult and then used in places like Struts or anywhere else in the container.
GuiceObjectFactory This class is a Guice Object Factory for Struts 2.
JPAModule This module should be used when JPA is required.
NamedAnnotation This class implements Named annotation.
WebModule This is the default module that most web applications that use JCatapult will extend.
WorkflowResolverModule This module is the default module that sets up the WorkflowResolver to use the DefaultWorkflowResolver.
